name: 餐桌吊燈 餐廳
properties:
{"conditionDeviceId":290,"conditionObjectType":"device","conditionId":"condition_centralSceneEvent5HeldDown_290","conditionLua":"true","conditionValue":"","trigger":"290 CentralSceneEvent 5 Released
290 CentralSceneEvent 5 HeldDown","actionDeviceId":104,"actionObjectType":"device","actionId":"action_levelUp_104","actionLua":"local deviceId = 104
if (sourceTrigger['type'] == 'event') then
if (sourceTrigger['event']['data']['keyAttribute'] == 'HeldDown') then
fibaro:call(deviceId, 'startLevelIncrease')
else
fibaro:call(deviceId, 'stopLevelChange')
end
elseif (sourceTrigger['type'] == 'other') then
fibaro:call(deviceId, 'startLevelIncrease')
end","actionValue":"","looping":true}
